	charset="iso-8859-1"

Atma and Technosis are hiding in a hole under a rock. Clash coes up and fli=
ps the rock open, and then fires, blasting the hold wide into a big pit. Cl=
ash takes a step forward.

Technosis is  crushed with fear and heartbreak, =
Psuedo's claws hanging from the shoulders of Clash, but they were Clash's c=
laws, part of his structure. Clash laughs jollily when he sees the pain on =
Technosis's face. Atma, feeling the same way but not showing it, moves towa=
rd Clash.

Technosis: Psuedo, you were the thing I loved the most, and just=
 like the rest, they took you away from me.

Technosis was filled with fury=
 and a thirst for revenge, and she ran towards Clash. Atma spun around and =
smashed Technosis to the ground. Technosis was then confused.

Technosis: W=
hy did you hit me?

Atma: Because I cae about you just like Psuedo did, now=
 go, run from this place, if anything happened to you then my purpose here =
meant nothing!

Technosis hesitated.

Atma: Go!

Technosis runs, but stops =
around a large rock formation and silenty dives into some water to watch wh=
at happened from afar. Atma stood still. Clash moved towards him laughing.
=

Clash: You will share the same fate as your friend.....
